text: Nagash Rising I - Cut off the Skaven

After being awoken by a foolish, power-hungry mortal, you rose in your ancestral seat of power - Nagashizzar. The ancient halls of your stronghold have been despoiled by filthy rats and gravediggers. You made quick work of the Skaven that polluted your halls - it's time to crush the remaining vermin as they flee.
Nagash Rising II - Secure the Mines
The filthy rats had infiltrated your home to sap out the Warpstone they hold so dear for their pointless experiments. Well, it's time to dig deeper and find another vein.
Nagash Rising III - Gather Your Legion
With your home secured and the Warpstone production on its way, there's only one thing left to do - gather what remnants of a Legion you can muster underfoot and undercroft.
The Legions rise, fresh yet ancient. Bloody this battalion by sending them against the nearby Skaven.
Nagash Rising V - Begin the Trek

Your power grows evermore, with the reconquest of your Desolation and the marching of your Legion. A missive is sent your way from a familiar face - Arkhan the Black, your most loyal servant. He's just on the other side of the World's Edge, having sensed your power. There's a tunnel system that will take you to him - and then the Legions can march on the Black Pyramid.
Nagash Rising VI - Capture the Black Pyramid

The Legions grow with your trusted servant at your side. He reminds you of a ritual of ascension, to bring you back into your most powerful form - but it must be enacted within the Black Pyramid. March onwards and destroy your former guardians turned rabid.

Supreme Lord, the Black Pyarmid is yours, as it always has been, but we must move towards our goal of completing the Great Ritual, take the city of Khemri.\\n\\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

Supreme Lord, the city of Morgheim will be of great value to us, restore the home of the cult of Nagash to it's former glory, long live Morgheim.\\n\\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

Supreme and masterful Lord of the dead, Mannfred Von Carstein sits in his accursed citedal, both he and his holding would make for a great prize, take Castle Draknehof.\\n\\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].
Lahmia the City of the Dawn

Supreme Lord, your loyal servant Neferata has a singular goal retake the city of Lahmia, do this, restore the cult of blood and bring her unwavering focus towards your own plans.\\n\\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

My gracious Lord, in one of Luthors mad ramblings he mentioned a place of great power that will surely progress our completion of the Great Ritual, journey to the Titan Peaks, take the city of Quintex.\\n\\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

My sire, we have recieved a cryptic message from the port city of The Awakening, we believe their leader Luthor Harkon would like to meet with you.\\n\\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].
Lahmia is Neferata's birth right, and it has been wrestled from her fair hands for too long. This shall not stand any longer.
After witnessing all that blood and massacre you inflicted upon the world, Krell is willing to join your side.

Vlad von Carstein, centuries past, had rebelled against the Empire of Man in a bid to claim the throne and establish himself as the Emperor of Man and Undeath. He was felled by the Grand Theogonist, his corpse laid low and placed into hiding. Find his body and bring him back into the fold.
Sylvania has long been Mannfred's domain, and he will let nobody else take it from him. Not even his sire.
Nagash Rising VII - Raise the Black Pyramid

All is in order to perform the Grand Resurrection, and return to your empowered state! Channel energy to the Black Pyramid, return it to the skies, and regain your ancient power!\\n\\n[[col:red]]NOTE: This will begin a series of battles as others try to stop you from raising the Black Pyramid. Nagash will be inactive during the battles to come, replaced with a temporary Traitor King.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]You can perform the ritual by clicking the Black Pyramid icon on the top bar.[[/col]]
Nagash Rising VIII - Survive the Onslaught
Others come to stop your Grand Resurrection, hoping to intercept your ascension to greater power. Hold them at bay as the Black Pyramid rises from the ground!
You need more warpstone and warpstone mines can be found in these settlements.
Nagash Rising IX - Ascend to Godhood

With the Grand Resurrection completed, the Black Pyramid propelled into the skies, and the Legions of Nagash spreading across the sands of Nehekhara, there is but one task left to pursue: Godhood. What better source of divinity than to sap its strength from places of worship and power? Knock the false gods off their thrones, reclaim ancient sites of dark magic, and establish yourself as the God of Death.
Defeat Azhag, and retrieve the crown!
Kill vikings for me. They mostly live in Minnesota
Finish the ritual by repelling all the incoming enemies
